amendment.description: To establish a life-saving program to prevent drug and opioid abuse in Medicare.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3367 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3367 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Toomey to Amendment SA 3378.
